nodes.text: Loman Vosso was a female Human Meatlump who lived on the planet Corellia during the time of the Galactic Civil War. Following the Battle of Yavin, she was a captain of the technology-hating Meatlumps and operated out of the Meatlump Hideout in Coronet City. Around 1 ABY, she tasked a spacer to recover missing supplies lost in the lower maintenance areas of Coronet's maintenance tunnels. The spacer therefore descended into the hostile lower maintenance areas and fought a way through S-1 and S-2 security droids. The spacer managed to find all the supplies and successfully brought them back to Loman Vosso.

Loman Vosso appeared as a non-player character in the 2003 video game Star Wars Galaxies, a massively multiplayer online role-playing game developed by Sony Online Entertainment and published by LucasArts, prior to its closure on December 15, 2011. Loman Vosso was added to the game as part of the "Meatlumps Theme Park", introduced with "Chapter 10: The Search for the Meatlump King", released on June 19, 2008.
